Key Match Events: Dillon Brooks was assessed a technical foul for hanging on the rim 28 seconds into Rockets-Grizzlies
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets were able to defeat the Grizzlies 119-115 and kept their No. 2 spot in the Western Conference standings
Miscellaneous Highlights: Alperen Sengun finished with 32 points and Jalen Green finished with 27, while their defense was able to force 20 turnovers
Others: This year, the Rockets have looked like a completely different team, and they've had the same roster from last season.
It was obvious this team was still trying to gel with each other, and now it looks like their work is paying off as their second in the conference.
It's been a group effort from the Rockets and how they've been able to win games, but it's also the toughness and grit that head coach Ime Udoka has them playing with.
